footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 09/23/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Freedom Sworn__ The EM substat provides extra damage for her reactions. The passive helps to boost her teams total damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Xiphos' Moonlight, Iron sting, Favonius Sword, Dark Iron Sword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: For a full EM build Kuki doesn't use her burst or normals as the EM stacking results in a lack of other stats which reduces her damage output.
